name: ElevenLabs TTS
description: Generate speech audio bytes from text using ElevenLabs API.

node.description: Generate speech audio bytes from text using ElevenLabs API.

code.name: code
code.value:
from typing import Optional
import requests
from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import StrInput, Output, MultilineInput
from langflow.schema import Data


class ElevenLabsTTSComponent(Component):
    display_name = "ElevenLabs TTS"
    description = "Generate speech audio bytes from text using ElevenLabs API."
    icon = "volume-up"
    name = "ElevenLabsTTS"

    inputs = [
        MultilineInput(
            name="text",
            display_name="Text",
            info="Text to convert to speech.",
            show=True,
            dynamic=True,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="voice_id",
            display_name="Voice ID",
            info="Voice ID to use.",
            value="JBFqnCBsd6RMkjVDRZzb",
            dynamic=True,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(
            name="audio_bytes",
            display_name="Audio Bytes",
            method="generate_audio",
            info="Generated audio as bytes."
        ),
    ]

    def generate_audio(self) -> Data:
        url = f"https://api.elevenlabs.io/v1/text-to-speech/{self.voice_id}?output_format=mp3_44100_128"
        headers = {"xi-api-key": "ELEVEN_LABS_API_KEY"}
        payload = {"text": self.text, "model_id": "eleven_multilingual_v2"}
        response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json=payload)
        if response.ok:
            return Data(data={"audio_bytes":response.content})
        else:
            raise RuntimeError(f"Failed to generate audio: {response.text}")
